title: AH-6 Little Bird Helicopter: Sound System + Flight Model
description: The AH-6 / MH-6 Little Bird Sound System is an easily customizable flight model and about 60 sounds, including engine, rotors and weapon effects for cockpit, exterior and distant views with implemented replication. Ideal for AAA multiplayer shooters.
longDescription:
VIDEO PREVIEW | HOW TO USE VIDEO

The AH-6 / MH-6 Little Bird Sound System - Crafted in C++ and Blueprints, meticulously controlled flight model for AH-6/MH-6 Boeing helicopters with the most realistic helicopter sound, just like in real life.


  • Easily customizable helicopter flight model
  • The most realistic engine sounds
  • Different sounds from different RPMs, speed, yaw and other helicopter's parameters
  • Weapon sounds from the weapons used by this helicopter in real life
  • Different sounds for cockpit, exterior, and distant views
  • Startup and Shutdown sounds
  • Cockpit sounds
  • Multiplayer Replication for movement and sounds
  • Ideal for AAA multiplayer shooter games


Over 35 high-quality helicopter engine sounds and about 30 weapon sounds, including the M134 Minigun, Hydra 70 rockets and AGM-114 Hellfire missiles, complement the realistic battle atmosphere. And supported by replication for use in multiplayer projects.


Experience the symphony of the sounds from exterior, cockpit, and distant perspectives. Our advanced sound system realistically reproduces engine sounds, rotor sounds, tail rotor sounds, and cabin shake, reflecting every change in helicopter's parameters such as engine RPM, rotor RPM, helicopter speed, and much more.


In our relentless pursuit of audio excellence, we have spared no effort to provide the most authentic helicopter sound experience possible. We meticulously recorded our own audio samples and combined them with resources sourced from the internet to ensure that every aspect of the AH-6 Little Bird's sound profile is faithfully represented.
technicalDetails:
Code Module:Â AH6_SoundSystem (Runtime Module)

Number of Blueprints: 7

Number of C++ Classes: 7

Network Replicated: Yes

Supported Development Platforms: Windows

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows


AH-6 LITTLE BIRD HELICOPTER SOUND SYSTEM DEMONSTRATION: VIDEO

HOW TO USE IT WITH OUR READY-MADE SCENE AND FLIGHT MODEL: VIDEO

  • Enable "AH6_SoundSystem " from Installed and "Windows RawInput" from Built-In plugins from "Edit > Plugins".
  • Set up the audio settings of your project as described in the 'How to Use' video.
  • Restart UE5.
  • Open "DemoLevel" from the plugin content folder.
  • FLY!!!


Check AH6_FlightModel_BP and AH6_SFX_Component_BP Actor Components in the AH6_Helicopter_BP to adjust Flight Model and Sound settings.


You can find all plugin content in Content Browser. Make sure the checkboxes Bottom right of the "Content Browser > View Options > Show Engine Content" and "Content Browser > View Options > Show Plugin Content" are checked.
